quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends
title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone
author: J.K Rowling

quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.
title: Steve Jobs - Life By Design
author: George Beahm

quote: Who you are is defined by what you’re willing to struggle for.
title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson

quote: This is the most simple and basic component of life: our struggles determine our successes.
title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson

quote: love is a decision, not just a feeling.
title: I Tagged Her In My Heart.
author: Anuj Tiwari

quote: You live in Ram's kingdom, hold your head high. Fight for justise. Treat all as equal. Protect the weak. Know that dharma is above all. Hold your head high, You live in the kingdom of Ram.
title: RAM- The Scion Of Ikshvaku
author: Amish Tripathi

quote: If people like you,the will listen you, if they trust you, they will do business with you
title: The art of story selling
author: keshav lal

quote: You will need to be mature and pragmatic. You must use your heart to decide the destination, but use your head to plot the journey.
title: SITA - The Warrior Of Mithila
author: Amish Tripathi

quote: Under the spreading chestnut tree I hold you and you hold me
author: George Orwell

quote: Once you've got a task to do, it's better to do it than live with the fear of it.
title: The Blade Itself
author: Joe Abercrombie

quote: When you can't cheat the game, you'd best find a means to cheat the players.
title: Red Seas Under Red Skies
author: Scott Lynch

quote: All of the best motives boiled down to a single, driving emotion.
title: The Alloy of Law
author: Brandon Sanderson

quote: There are three things all wise men fear: the sea in storm, a night with no moon, and the anger of a gentle man.
title: The Name of the Wind.
author: Patrick Rothfuss

quote: Half of seeming clever is keeping your mouth shut at the right times.
title: The Wise Man's Fear
author: Patrick Rothfuss

quote: I'll make him an offer he can't refuse.
title: The Godfather
author: Mario Puzo

quote: It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Still, there are times I am bewildered by each mile I have traveled, each meal I have eaten, each person I have known, each room in which I have slept. As ordinary as it all appears, there are times when it is beyond my imagination.
title: Interpreter of Maladies
author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quote: I hope you're pleased with yourselves. We could all have been killed - or worse, expelled
title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: The truth. It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution.
title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste a lot of it.
title: On the Shortness of Life
author: Seneca 49AD

quote: It is a far, far better thing that I do, than I have ever done; it is a far, far better rest I go to than I have ever known.
title: A Tale of Two Cities
author: Charles Dickens

quote: It is a far, far better thing that I do, than I have ever done; it is a far, far better rest I go to than I have ever known.
title: A Tale of Two Cities
author: Charles Dickens

quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
title: The Fellowship of the Ring
author: J.R.R. Tolkein

quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You’re on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who’ll decide where to go…
title: Oh, the Places You’ll Go!
author: Dr Seuss

quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Whenever you feel like criticizing anyone … just remember that all the people in this world haven’t had the advantages that you’ve had.
title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Real courage is when you know you’re licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what.
title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee

quote: We are such stuff as dreams are made on, and our little life is rounded with a sleep.
title: The Tempest
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
title: The Fellowship of the Ring
author: J.R.R. Tolkein

quote: The Answer to the ultimate question of Life, The Universe and Everything is…42!
title: The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
title: Les Miserables
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Beware for I am fearless, and therefore powerful.
title: Frankenstein
author: Mary Shelley

quote: I can’t go back to yesterday because I was a different person then.
title: Alice in Wonderland
author: Lewis Carrol

quote: Great men are not born great. They grow great.
title: The Godfather
author: Mario Puzo

quote: Seek freedom and become captive of your desires, seek discipline and find your liberty.
title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert

quote: Humanity does not ask us to be happy. It merely asks us to be brilliant on its behalf.
title: Ender’s Game
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: And don’t spend your time lookin’ around for something you want that can’t be found.
title: The Jungel Book
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: People generally see what they look for, and hear what they listen for.
title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee

quote: It takes something more than intelligence to act intelligently.
title: Crime and Punishment
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: We’ve all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That’s who we really are.
title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
author: J. K. Rowling
